quote: You tried your best and you failed miserably. The lesson is: Never try.
author: Homer Simpson

quote: I'm a white male, age 18 to 49. Everyone listens to me, no matter how dumb my suggestions are.
author: Homer Simpson

quote: Me fail English? That's unpossible.
author: Ralph Wiggum

quote: Your ideas are intriguing to me, and I wish to subscribe to your newsletter.
author: Homer Simpson

quote: Everything’s coming up Milhouse.
author: Milhouse Van Houten

quote: I used to be with it, but then they changed what ‘it’ was, and now what I’m with isn’t it. And what’s ‘it’ seems weird and scary to me.
author: Abe Simpson

quote: I, for one, welcome our new insect overlords.
author: Kent Brockman

quote: It takes two to lie: one to lie and one to listen.
author: Homer Simpson

quote: They taste like burning.
author: Ralph Wiggum

quote: Marriage is like a coffin and each kid is another nail.
author: Homer Simpson

quote: I can’t promise I’ll try, but I’ll try to try.
author: Bart Simpson

quote: My cat’s breath smells like cat food.
author: Ralph Wiggum

quote: Just because I don't care doesn't mean I don't understand.
author: Homer Simpson

quote: Listen to your mother, kids. Aim low. Aim so low no one will even care if you succeed. Dinner's in the oven. If you want some butter it's under my face.
author: Marge Simpson

quote: If you pray to the wrong God, you might just make the right one madder and madder.
author: Homer Simpson

quote: May all your disgraces be private!
author: Mayor Quimby

quote: Since the beginning of time, man has yearned to destroy the sun.
author: Homer Simpson

quote: Sorry, Mom, the mob has spoken.
author: Bart Simpson

quote: Prayer. The last refuge of a scoundrel.
author: Lisa Simpson

quote: Mom, romance is dead. It was acquired in a hostile takeover by Hallmark and Disney, homogenized, and sold off piece by piece.
author: Lisa Simpson

quote: I learned that beneath my goody two shoes lies some very dark socks.
author: Lisa Simpson

quote: Well, he's kind of had it in for me ever since I accidentally ran over his dog. Actually, replace 'accidentally' with 'repeatedly' and replace 'dog' with 'son'.
author: Lionel Hutz

quote: You'll have to speak up, I'm wearing a towel.
author: Homer Simpson

quote: I don't hate your mother, Marge. I just wouldn't be sad if she died.
author: Homer Simpson

quote: Hi, Super Nintendo Chalmers!
author: Ralph Wiggum

quote: Oh, my God. The dead have risen, and they're voting Republican.
author: Bart Simpson

quote: The reason we have elected officials is so we don't have to think all the time.
author: Homer Simpson

quote: Bake him away, toys.
author: Chief Clancy Wiggum

quote: Last night's 'Itchy & Scratchy' was, without a doubt, the worst episode ever. Rest assured that I was on the Internet within minutes, registering my disgust throughout the world.
author: Comic Book Guy

quote: Well, it doesn't matter how you live or what you did wrong. As long as you're on TV, people will respect you.
author: Bart Simpson

quote: Why are you people avoiding me? Does my withered face remind you of the grim specter of death?
author: Abe Simpson

quote: If you need me, I'll be in the refrigerator.
author: Homer Simpson

quote: You're turning me into a crimminal when all I want to be is a petty thug.
author: Bart Simpson

quote: A man who envies our family is a man who needs help.
author: Lisa Simpson

quote: I hope you understand I'm too tense to pretend I like you.
author: Marge Simpson

quote: Shut up brain. I got friends now. I don't need you anymore.
author: Lisa Simpson

quote: Remember the time he ate my goldfish and you lied to me and said I never had any goldfish? Then why did I have the bowl, Bart? Why did I have the bowl?
author: Milhouse Van Houten

quote: If a cow ever got the chance, he'd eat you and everyone you care about.
author: Troy McClure

quote: Oh, wow, windows. I don't think I could afford this place.
author: Otto Mann

quote: Call this an unfair generalization if you must but old people are no good at everything.
author: Moe Szyslak

quote: The most rewarding part was when he gave me my money.
author: Dr. Nick Riviera

quote: Oh, wow. I've wasted my life
author: Otto Mann

quote: Man, you go through life, you try to be nice to people, you struggle to resist the urge to punch 'em in the face, and for what?
author: Moe Szyslak
